text:
The original delinquents of “The 100” are shattered as they face the consequences of their allegiances in the civil war that broke out in Arkadia this season.

In this exclusive clip (above) from Thursday’s episode, Kane (Henry Ian Cusick) and Octavia (Marie Avgeropoulos) have trouble forgiving Bellamy (Bob Morley), even as they make plans to save Monty (Christopher Larkin), who’s in trouble for having helped them last week.

Also Read: 'The 100' Star Says Showrunner Bullied Him Off Series: 'What He Did Was Disgusting'

They make a plan to trade Bellamy for Monty, though Miller (Jarrod Joseph) and Bryan (Jonathan Whitesall) are reluctant to keep treating their former leader as “the enemy.”

“The 100” has been renewed for a fourth season, though it has been plagued by recent controversies.

The show airs on Thursdays at 9 p.m. ET on The CW.
title: 'The 100' Sneak Peek: Octavia Takes Bellamy Hostage (Video)
